archimate:BusinessObject.name: 10/ Enteprise Business Object
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation: Kind of information expected by enterprise processes and produced by all business process . It tracks data of every business activity outcomes in order to build an business referential used to operate all business services. It is often detailled by lower level of definition , Detailled Business Object(14) since it collect them and managed them as a whole when mature . It is also and entry point of a business dictionnary, or namming convention , a list of acronyms, used by all discipline and departement to name theirs datas via a more precise convention. It is sometimes in line with PROCESS RESULT(5)definition and sometimes in deviation to it but the only source to compose it .
